lead_paragraph: John Fox of the Denver Broncos and Gary Kubiak of the Houston Texans are the latest to learn firsthand the hard truth about the demands of their jobs.
snippet: John Fox of the Denver Broncos and Gary Kubiak of the Houston Texans are the latest to learn firsthand the hard truth about the demands of their jobs.
